## Visualizations

Making density plots of the parameters, based on benign or malignant

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)



# set seed
set.seed(1234)

ggplot(data = cancer_data,
       mapping = aes(x = cancer_data$g3C09, color = event_label)) +
  geom_density() +
  labs()
 
# Customize density plot
ggplot(data = cancer_dataset, 
       mapping = aes(x = cancer_dataset$`radius mean`, 
           color = cancer_dataset$diagnosis)) +
  
  geom_density(alpha = 0.5, 
               color = "black", 
               size = 1) +
  
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("category1" = "red", "category2" = "blue")) +
  labs(x = "Parameter", y = "Value", title = "Density Plot by Category") +
  theme_minimal()
```
